title: New: VÉRITÉ – Echo
body:
Having made her live debut last month for Neon Gold, Brooklyn’s **VÉRITÉ** is set to hit CMJ in a few weeks time, with her first EP released a few days beforehand.

Featuring the previous Hype Machine popular Strange Enough and Weekend, alongside new track, _Echo_, it’s one of the most impressive breakthrough EP’s of the year, and marks her out as one of the brightest stars to keep an eye out for in 2015.
